name: Solar System (itch) (freeves)
description:
This is my solar system project. I added the following elements

1. Sun 2. Mercury 3. Mars 4. Earth 5. Saturn 6. Uranus 7 .Venus 8. Pluto 9. Jupiter 10. Comet (spawns) 11. Phantom Zone with Captain Marvel trapped circling the earth.12. Added audio "Let me out of here" on clicking phantom zone.
